directions: Beat cream cheese in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth; mix in pumpkin puree until smooth. Stir confectioners' sugar and pumpkin pie spice into mixture until evenly mixed; fold in whipped topping. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for flavors to blend, about 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
title: Whipped Pumpkin Dip
